Welcome to althiqa’s documentation!

althiqa is a SaaS service to make AI evaluation simple and trustworthy. It allows data scientists, ML engineers and ML researchers to communicate easily the key aspects of their models to all stakeholders: business experts and managers, compliance and risk teams etc. althiqa is not an autoML platform but a service to facilitate ML reporting and ML communication. The users are end-to-end in full control of their metrics and their models. They interact with the SaaS service through althiqa’s simple and intuitive API. You can visit our website

Note

This project is under active development.
